name: Bookish Banter
description: A literary adventure through worlds of words.
questions: If I were a villain in a book, what would my evil plan be?
Which book character would be my worst date?

name: Culinary Chronicles
description: A tasty trivia tour of global cuisines and cooking.
questions: If I were a dish, why would people send me back to the kitchen?
What's the weirdest thing I've ever eaten and pretended to like?

name: Future Forecast
description: Predicting trends and tech in tomorrow's world.
questions: What futuristic invention do I wish existed right now?
If I were a robot, what would be my annoying malfunction?

name: Hobbies Highlight
description: Exploring fun and unique pastimes across the globe.
questions: What hobby would I be hilariously bad at?
If my life were a hobby, what would it be called?

name: Movie Mayhem
description: A cinematic scramble through film history and fandom.
questions: Which movie title best describes my love life?
If I could be a movie villain, who would I be?

name: Musical Musings
description: A harmonious quiz on bands, songs, and musical history.
questions: Which song would play every time I enter a room?
What's the most embarrassing concert I've ever been to?

name: Nostalgia Nook
description: Reliving the cherished moments and trends of yesteryears.
questions: Which old trend do I secretly want to bring back?
What's my most embarrassing childhood memory?

name: Quirky Queries
description: Unusual and amusing questions to tickle your brain.
questions: If I were an alien, what would be my quirky habit?
What's the silliest thing I believe in?

name: Tech Talk
description: A digital dive into gadgets, gizmos, and cutting-edge tech.
questions: Which app would I be and why?
What tech gadget am I hopelessly addicted to?

name: Wanderlust Wonders
description: A globetrotting trivia journey across continents and cultures.
questions: If I were a city, which one would I be and why?
What's the most embarrassing travel faux pas I've committed?
